newsitem.title: USA: Scandipharm accepts Claneil $41 mln investment.
newsitem.headline: Scandipharm accepts Claneil $41 mln investment.

text.p: Scandipharm Inc said Monday that Claneil Enterprises Inc agreed to invest up to $41 million in the company.

Scandipharm, which develops, manufactures and markets pharmaceutical products and services for underserved medical markets, said it would use the funds to expand its sales organization and to acquire and develop new products.

Claneil Enterprises, a privately-held company based in Plymouth Meeting, Pennsylvania, committed an initial investment of $32 million, with the balance in the form of options which may be exercised over two years.
